name: Decaying Zoblin
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can’t speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zoblin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 10 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zoblin drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Putrid
traits.desc: A creature that touches the zoblin or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1 necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.
